questions.question: Considering the overall textual layout, what is the dominant orientation of the presented information on the surface?
What is the primary textual style employed throughout the visible content?

Disregarding punctuation, what is the approximate number of distinct words included?
Observing the text's density, is the information presentation compact or sparse?
Focusing on the text's typeface, is the font weight predominantly light, medium, or bold?
Considering the text's overall visual appearance, is it clean and easy to read or cluttered and illegible?
